sentences: My daughter and her family of four returned to Korea after living in the US for two years.
I can't run as often as before now that it is getting cold.

today_delta.title: EBS 라디오 입이 트이는 영어 - 2.26 My Sweet Home
today_delta.vocab:
lump-sum lease: 전세
persuade: 설득하다
struggle: 투쟁하다, 몸부림치다
clutter: 채우다, 잡동사니
today_delta.sentences:
I always dreamed of having a place of my own.
I won an apartment lottery after 22 years.
I burst into tears.

message:
[알림][오늘의영어]
오늘의 영어 공부 (2026-02-28)

[오늘의 단어]
- lump-sum lease: 전세
- persuade: 설득하다
- struggle: 투쟁하다, 몸부림치다
- clutter: 채우다, 잡동사니
- consciousness: 의식, 자각
- sheer: 순전한, 순수한
- oral: 구두, 입의
- handful: 한 줌, 소량, 다루기 힘든
- reincarnate: 환생하다

[오늘의 문장]
- I always dreamed of having a place of my own.
- I won an apartment lottery after 22 years.
- I burst into tears.
- My daughter and her family of four returned to Korea after living in the US for two years.
- I can't run as often as before now that it is getting cold.
- Lately, I have been upset with him and found myself acting cold toward him.
